T02D2755:134b-0: @134b * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2755:134b-2: nam mkha'i mdzod ni brnyes pas te //
T02D2755:134b-3: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2755:134b-4: sa bcu'i dbang phyug lha dang mi yi gtso //
T02D2755:134b-5: bsod nams ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho yi //
T02D2755:134b-6: mthar phyin gter phyin nam mkha' mdzod brnyes pa //
T02D2755:134b-7: 'jig rten mgon la btud de de bsnyen brjod //
T02D2755:134b-8: sngags 'chang bdag don gzhan don thams cad du //
T02D2755:134b-9: me 'obs 'bar ba bsil khang nyams dga' ltar //
T02D2755:134b-10: shes nas mi chags chags chen rnal 'byor spyod //
T02D2755:134b-11: mtha' yas nam mkha'i mdzod gter rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2755:134b-12: phun tshogs tshal lam yang na dbul po'am //
T02D2755:134b-13: yang na dgon dben yid dga'i gnas rnams su //
T02D2755:134b-14: shin tu gos gyon me tog mandal byas //
T02D2755:134b-15: gdung ba spangs pas mgon po dran par bya //
T02D2755:134b-16: padmo zla steng rin chen bum bzang dang //
T02D2755:134b-17: 'dab stong au dum b'a ra'i ge sar rtse //
T02D2755:134b-18: mnyam med sa gsum kha lo bsgyur mdzad pa //
T02D2755:134b-19: chos rgyas gser mdog 'bar bar bsgom par bya //
T02D2755:134b-20: hr'i: las skye pa'i gzhon nu blta na sdug pa yid bzhin gyi shing la sku brten pa //
T02D2755:134b-21: g-yon na padmo 'dzin cing g-yas kyis nor rnams thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2755:134b-22: phyogs gcig na 'phags pa nor 'phel rnga yab thogs nas nor gyi rgyun 'bebs pa dang /
T02D2755:134b-23: phyogs gcig na lha mo nor sbyin ma ril ba
T02D2755:134b-24: 'dzin pa nor bu dmar po'i phreng bas brgyan pa
T02D2755:134b-25: ste / 'di dag ni btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
T02D2755:134b-26: nam mkha'i mdzod brnyes pa'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi
T02D2755:134b-27: rnam par 'phrul pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T02D2755:134b-28: 'di ni bsgom par bya ba'i gnas //
T02D2755:134b-29: 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel byed pa //
T02D2755:135a-1: nams sprin chen gsal ba'i rgyu //
T02D2755:135a-2: gsang sngags char chen nor sbyin gzhan //
T02D2755:135a-3: snying brtse dga' dang yid gzhungs pas //
T02D2755:135a-4: don chen byed pa rig sngags che //
T02D2755:135a-5: nam mkha' mtha' yas gzungs dang ni //
T02D2755:135a-6: sprin chen mdzod kyi rtog pa'o //
T02D2755:135a-7: ji skad bstan pa'i snying po bzhi //
T02D2755:135a-8: nus gnyis ldan pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2755:135a-9: 'bum phrag lngar ni bzlas nas su //
T02D2755:135a-10: ci yod lam chen gnas su sbyin //
T02D2755:135a-11: shin tu phan 'dod gdung ba yis //
T02D2755:135a-12: mgon po la ni mchod pa dang //
T02D2755:135a-13: rang gi 'tsho ba ma gtogs par //
T02D2755:135a-14: thams cad yongs su mi gzung ngo //
T02D2755:135a-15: de ltar chog shes gzhan dbang g-yo //
T02D2755:135a-16: som nyi sbangs dang yang med de //
T02D2755:135a-17: de ni nyin re sbyin na yang /
